EmailTemplate.name: Mkt: New Inquiry Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry to {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out to {!Organization.Name}, we look forward to working with you.
I would like to introduce myself as your Account Manager. Should you have any questions, please feel free to call me at {!User.Phone} or email me at {!User.Email}.
You can also contact {!Organization.Name} on the following numbers:
Main: 810-545-1000 Sales: 810-545-1222 Customer Service & Support: 810-545-1333 Fax: 810-545-1001
I am confident {!Organization.Name} will serve you well and hope to see our relationship grow over the years.
Best Regards, {!User.Name}
